snippet: For as long as he can remember, Otis Hampton, who was born with cerebral palsy, has simply wanted to become self-reliant.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, draws $268 to cover cellphone charges and buy Metrocards for Otis Hampton, who has always simply wanted to become self-reliant despite being born with cerebral palsy.
lead_paragraph: For as long as he can remember, Otis Hampton, who was born with cerebral palsy, has simply wanted to become self-reliant.

headline.seo: Pushing Past Limitations and Aiming to Inspire
headline.main: Ignoring Limitations and Aiming to Inspire
